name: Blitz (itch)
description:
WIP - Blitz Horror game

GameJam project - Theme: Mirrors

You are locked in a creepy mansion and have to collect the items scattered around to help you capture and remove the ghost that is stalking you. Trap the mirrors to hold the ghost in place for a few seconds, remember you can't see it but you can see it's reflection.

No way near finished, ran out of time.

Hopefully I will continue to work on this so I hope you like it.

(Re-Upload Now including graphics option menu, to address performance issues play on low) *created during the jam allowed to be uploaded by Matthew*
